lesson.title_and_level: Upper-Intermediate - Getting Internet at your Apartment

sentence.idiomatic: That restaurant has quite a few business lunch sets, but none of them are any good.
If you send a lot of text messages, you should choose the text messaging package deal.
Buying the things for ourselves is too much trouble. How about we just select a renovation package deal?
We bought an air conditioning unit. They are delivering it tomorrow, and installing it the day after.
The young guy that installed the broadband internet had a very nice manner, and his skills were quite good.
You should install satellite TV--you can watch programs on dozens of channels.
Some clothing in smaller shops is more or less the same price as the name brand stuff.
The most expensive and the cheapest differ in price by only 20 RMB. Just buy the expensive one.
Our height only differs by two centimeters. How come she looks so tall?
I can't beat you at chess; I admit defeat.
I really can't believe I can't beat this guy. I'm not going to bed tonight!
He is the one that is amazing at long-distance running. My strength can't measure up to his.
If by chance she refuses me, what should I do?
Tomorrow we should set off early. If we miss the train it will be a big pain.
If work is hard to find in Shanghai, you can just come back home.

word.literal: to be not as good as

sentence.idiomatic: It's better to not buy one at all than to buy a bad one.

word.literal: to be not as good as

sentence.idiomatic: Nowadays housing is so expensive, it's better to rent than to buy.

word.literal: to not be as good as

sentence.idiomatic: Nobody is as good at speaking Chinese as he is.
We want to install broadband internet.
OK, take a look at this paper. There are a lot of packages. Different speeds are different prices.
So many! Looking at it makes my head spin. Can you give us a simple explanation of each?

This 512K one you definitely won't want. The speed is too slow. Right now, most people install the 1 MB or 2 MB. If you pay by the month, one is 140, and the other is 150. If you go for the yearly package they are 1680 and 1800, respectively.
OK then, we'll just take the 2 MB package. In the space of a year, the prices work out to be nearly the same.
200 RMB is still money. The 2 MB package is a waste. We don't ordinarily download that much. We only browse web pages and stuff.
Says who? I also want to play online games. If the speed is slow, I won't be able compete at all.
Didn't you stop playing online games?
I'm just saying that if I want to play, I won't have a way to. It's better to spend a little more now and install the faster option.
Fine, fine. I can't win with you. Get the 2 MB installed then.
Miss, we want the 2 MB installed, one year package. When can you install it?
Did you bring your ID card? If you brought it, and you pay the money today, then tomorrow we can come by and install it.
Oh no, I must have forgotten to bring it with me. Wait here for me, I'll go back and get it.
You want the internet so bad you're losing your mind.

word.literal: to be unable to win an argument
to be able to win an argument
